original_title: Sulle Arie, sulle Acque, sui Luoghi
overview: Between 1946 and 1951, "The Sardinian Project" upsets the history of Sardinia: the definitive disappearance of malaria, an endemic disease in many areas of the island. However, the disinfestation of the island represents only the first station of a stratified journey, a path between different eras, registers and points of view: the propaganda images and war-like symbols intersect with the gaze of the film-amateurs.
title: Sulle Arie, sulle Acque, sui Luoghi
